intro.paragraph1: When I was wondering what I should do for my future career, my friend invited me to study computer science and start coding. Fast-forward to today, now I'm currently Software QA Engineer at NBC SportsNext/SportsEngine identifying and resolving bugs, accompanied by creating and maintaining automation tests.
intro.paragraph2: I've had a great privilege to work with great engineers from all sorts of background and skills. I would have never thought that a simple invitation from my friend would lead me to be a part of this amazing "Tech World."

dataExperience.skills: JavaScript, Appium, WebdriverIO, Cucumber, Microsoft Azure

projectData.title: My Portfolio
projectData.description: Created this portfolio website to show case my resume and projects. It's nothing much yet, but continuing to improve this page.

projectData.title: Stopwatch
projectData.description: Fun small project I saw on Instagram reels and decided to try it out. Created a super simple stopwatch app that measures time and also resets.

projectData.title: Expense Tracker
projectData.description: Making an expense tracker app. Thought it was a good idea to make this to keep up with my finances.

projectData.title: Weather App
projectData.description: One of my first projects to work on. It can get diverse information about the weather on the searched city all over the world.
